value:
$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|All right, everyone, listen up! The
harvest season is upon us! We must
prepare to...WEAR COSTUMES!$k$p$EFace_Pain|There is one problem though...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|What is it, Commander?$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Pain|I've been hearing that, this year...
ghosts will be appearing for real!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Cool2|G-g-ghosts? REAL ghosts?! You're
not serious, are you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face|Hah! Sharena, everyone knows
ghosts aren't real. There's never
been a single shred of—$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Cool|OOooOOOooo! That's right!
REAL ghosts!$k$pIn the eerie light of the moon, they
appear, apparitions that know no
rest or respite—only hunger!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|That doesn't sound too bad! Maybe
one of them will be friends with me!
Having a ghost friend could be nice!$k$pThey must know a lot and have all
kinds of amazing tales to tell!$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|...$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|What's wrong, Brother?
You seem tense...$k$pEr, wait— Now that I think about it,
you've always been afraid of ghosts,
haven't you?$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Haha...ha... N-no. I'm fine, Sharena.
I'm not a child anymore, you know.$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Friends of justice! Allies of order and
righteousness! Know that I, L'Arachel,
am here to trick-or-treat!$k$pWhat could be more pleasing than
a festival where all may dress in
whatever costume they desire!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Halloween19,Face|Hhnngh...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|What was that sound? Oh! Hello?
Are you quite all right? Please, hold
yourself together now, dear!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Halloween19,Face|I'm so...hungry...$k$p$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Well, that simply won't do, will it?
Worry not—I shall treat you to a hot
bowl of soup right away!$k$pPerhaps with some— Huh. Was
there not a giant pumpkin here
only a moment ago?$k$p$WmMPID_ハロヨファ,ch09_13_Lofa_M_Halloween19,Face|Umm... There was. But...then Ilyana
here ate the entire thing...$k$p

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_ハロラーチェル,ch08_10_Larchel_F_Halloween19,Face|Come now, dear, we must save our
strength for the final showdown.
Make haste! We must retreat!$k$p$WmMPID_ハロイレース,ch09_14_Erase_F_Halloween19,Face|Need...food...$k$p$Sbs150|
